name: DFS using Static Voting Protocol
tagline: Fault Tolerant  distributed file system uses static voting protocol and SCTP.
body:
### What the heck is this ?  
This is a JAVA program to work as a distributed file system.  
Assumes File System is Flat.(Contains only files and no directories).  
Supports failures.  
Supports Read and Write Operations.  


### How it Works?  
`INITIALIZATION :
1.SCTP connections are created and stored in HashMaps.
